Text: Assignment of Transaction No Further to yesterdays discussions attached is a revised draft of the assignment agreement Please provide any further comments by email Yours truly Gulf Canada Resources Limited per Michael P Kleiner Enron contract assignmentdoc Enron contract assignmentdoc

FW Assignment of transaction no Message From Kleiner Michael Sent Wednesday March PM To Houghton Brian Subject Assignment of transaction no Everyone Attached is a revised assignment agreement which we hope you will find satisfactory Our hope is to have this agreement signed Thursday Michelles fax and counterpart execution clause should facilitate execution Let me know if you expect any problems with execution Gulf Canada Resources Limited per Michael P Kleiner Law Department Enron contract assignmentdoc Enron contract assignmentdoc

RE FW Assignment of transaction no Cc Dan Sorry I missed removing Alberta I have deleted it from the version on our system I have made the Effective Date April I am forwarding a hard copy to Michelle so that BP and GulfCrestar will have the same version for sure My facsimile number is and Michelles is Mike Original Message From SMTP Sent Thursday March AM To Cc Subject Re FW Assignment of transaction no Michael I have reviewed the assignment documennt I intend to make two changes which I hope you make in the copies that the other parties are signing These being that the Assignment be effective as of April and the left over reference to Alberta be deleted from Enron North America Corps address I will attach Transaction No to the Assignment Document and have it executed by Enron If you will provide me with the fax numbers for each party I will fax to these numbers My fax number is Kleiner Michael To MichaelKleine cc Subject FW Assignment of transaction no PM Original Message From Kleiner Michael Sent Wednesday March PM To Houghton Brian Subject Assignment of transaction no Everyone Attached is a revised assignment agreement which we hope you will find satisfactory Our hope is to have this agreement signed Thursday Michelles fax and counterpart execution clause should facilitate execution Let me know if you expect any problems with execution Gulf Canada Resources Limited per Michael P Kleiner Law Department Enron contract assignmentdoc See attached file Enron contract assignmentdoc File Enron contract assignmentdoc

FW re Enron AOS dealDan and Michelle Further to Bruces note the other day could we use something like the following in the two EnronCEMC agreements to be inserted in Other Conditions immediately following the para providing for the notification Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein or in the Enfolio Spot General Terms and Conditions each party shall in addition to the other remedies hereunder be liable to reimburse the other for any imbalance charges loan costs or similar charges reasonably incurred by the other as a result of the failure a in the case of Enron to provide the delivery information required by am on each Nomination Day and b in the case of Customer to forward such information to Alliance Pipeline on each Nomination Day in a timely manner
